byline.original: By ELIZABETH A. HARRIS and KATE TAYLOR

abstract: Former students of Bronx High School of Science teacher Jon Cruz are questioning his reputation following investigation that revealed he coerced students from other schools into sending him nude or suggestive photographs; Cruz, prominent figure in world of high school debate, was considered an exceptionally devoted teacher.
lead_paragraph: Former students of Jon Cruz, accused of coercing teenagers from other schools into sending him nude photos, recall his devotion, but some now question his behavior.

headline.main: Bronx Science Teacher in Child Pornography Case Told Students ‘You’re a Big Deal’
headline.print_headline: He Told Students They Were ‘A Big Deal’
